description: This is your moment to produce true electricity using the steam you've been making up until now. The /b/LV Steam Turbine/b/ will convert every 1 mb of Steam into 1 EU of energy and will do this up to 32 times a tick, making a maximum energy production rate of 32 EU/t.
The /b/Steam Turbine/b/ will automatically send electricity to any machine connected directly to its output side. It will also only connect to cables placed on its output side.
The first one you'll make is of the Low Voltage tier. There are higher tier steam turbines, but you aren't quite there yet.
